description.value:
A fusillade of jagged splinters flies from you. Creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] take @Damage[(floor((max(1,@actor.level)-1)/2)+1)d4[piercing], (floor((max(1,@actor.level)-1)/2)+1)d4[persistent,bleed]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC.

Level (+2) Each type of damage increases by 1d4.
